item.title: 据彭博社报道，杰富瑞集团对已倒闭的英国贷款机构MFS的风险敞口达1.35亿美元。
item.description: 据彭博社周四报道，知情人士透露，杰富瑞集团对抵押贷款融资公司Market Financial Solutions（简称MFS）的风险敞口约为1亿英镑（合1.35亿美元）。该公司本周已进入英国破产程序。【原文：Jefferies has an exposure of about 100 million pounds ($135 million) to Market Financial Solutions, or MFS, a mortgage-finance firm that entered a UK form of insolvency this week, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称，在海湾地区人工智能热潮中，QST正权衡沙特业务的多种选择，包括出售方案。
item.description: 知情人士向路透社透露，数据中心公司Quantum Switch Tamasuk正考虑战略选择方案，包括出售其沙特业务。该交易可能重新吸引全球收购公司的兴趣，这些公司正寻求分得海湾地区人工智能热潮的一杯羹。【原文：Data-center company Quantum Switch Tamasuk is considering strategic options, including a sale of its Saudi business, four people with knowledge of the matter told Reuters, in a deal that could attract renewed interest from global buyout firms seeking a slice of the Gulf's AI boom.】

item.title: 墨西哥阿兹特克电视台宣布启动破产程序
item.description: 墨西哥广播公司TV Azteca周四宣布，其股东已批准启动自愿破产程序，以重组公司财务及债务。该公司由墨西哥商业巨头里卡多·萨利纳斯·普列戈掌控。【原文：Mexican broadcaster TV Azteca, which is controlled by Mexican business magnate Ricardo Salinas Pliego, said on Thursday that shareholders had approved a voluntary bankruptcy process for restructuring the company's finances and liabilities.】

item.title: 女子因社交媒体成瘾起诉Meta和YouTube，预计将在庭审中出庭作证
item.description: 一名加州女子预计将于周四出庭作证，讲述童年时期使用Meta平台的Instagram和谷歌的YouTube如何损害了她的心理健康。她于洛杉矶提起的这场具有里程碑意义的诉讼仍在继续。【原文：A California woman is expected to testify in court on Thursday about how using Meta Platforms' Instagram and Google's YouTube as a child harmed her mental health, as her landmark trial in Los Angeles continues.】

item.title: 先锋集团表示已解决德克萨斯州总检察长及其他州提起的诉讼
item.description: 基金管理公司先锋集团周四表示，已就德克萨斯州及其他州共和党总检察长提起的诉讼达成和解。这些总检察长指控该基金管理公司及其竞争对手通过气候行动主义活动违反了反垄断法。【原文：Fund manager Vanguard Group said on Thursday it has settled litigation filed by the Republican attorneys general of Texas and other states, who had alleged the fund manager and rivals had violated antitrust law through their climate activism.】

item.title: 法官驳回健威公司撤销德州泰诺安全诉讼的请求
item.description: 得克萨斯州一名法官周四驳回了肯维公司（Kenvue）提出的撤诉请求。此前该州总检察长肯·帕克斯顿（Ken Paxton）起诉该公司，指控其在推广泰诺（Tylenol）时隐瞒了孕妇服用该流行止痛药可能导致儿童自闭症及其他风险的真相。【原文：A Texas judge on Thursday rejected Kenvue's bid to dismiss a lawsuit by state Attorney General Ken Paxton accusing the company of falsely marketing Tylenol by concealing autism and other risks to children when pregnant women use the popular painkiller.】

item.title: 德国工会称与特斯拉的纠纷已达成和解
item.description: 德国金属工会（IG Metall）周四发表声明称，该工会与特斯拉就本月早些时候在柏林郊外工厂举行的员工代表会议争议达成和解协议。【原文：Tesla and German union IG Metall reached agreement on Thursday to settle a dispute over a meeting of the works council at the carmaker's plant outside Berlin earlier this month, the union said in a statement.】

item.title: 谷歌推出Nano Banana 2，此前其AI图像生成工具因病毒式传播大获成功
item.description: 谷歌周四发布了其病毒式传播的Nano Banana图像生成模型的继任者，宣称该模型性能更强劲。这家搜索引擎巨头正致力于吸引更多用户使用其人工智能工具。【原文：Google on Thursday unveiled a successor to its viral Nano Banana image generation model, touting faster performance as the search-engine behemoth pushes to attract more users to its AI tools.】

item.title: 苹果寻求驳回针对Siri人工智能的欺诈诉讼，并要求Epic游戏公司撤销禁令
item.description: 苹果公司敦促联邦法官驳回一项拟议集体诉讼，该诉讼指控苹果公司通过夸大其Siri语音助手的人工智能能力，以及虚假宣称其遵守了关于应用销售佣金的禁令，两次欺诈股东。【原文：Apple urged a federal judge to dismiss a proposed class action claiming it defrauded shareholders twice, by overstating the artificial intelligence capabilities of its Siri voice assistant and falsely representing its compliance with an injunction governing commissions on app sales.】

item.title: 科特迪瓦和加纳的可可销售危机是如何形成的？
item.description: 全球半数可可豆的产地——科特迪瓦和加纳——今年因全球产量充裕、可可价格走低以及巧克力制造商对该原料需求下降，正面临销售豆子和支付农民报酬的困境。【原文：The producers of half the world's cocoa - Ivory Coast and Ghana - have struggled to sell beans and pay farmers this year due to ample global harvests, lower cocoa prices and falling demand from chocolate makers for the ingredient.】

item.title: 沃尔玛同意支付1亿美元以解决虚假盈利指控，美国联邦贸易委员会称
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周四在一份声明中表示，沃尔玛已同意支付1亿美元以解决相关指控，该指控称该公司导致配送司机损失数千万美元收入。【原文：Walmart has agreed to pay $100 million to settle charges the company caused delivery drivers to lose tens of millions of dollars in earnings, the U.S. Federal Trade Commission said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称CNBC将整合数字与电视新闻业务，裁减近十个岗位
item.description: 据四位知情人士向路透社透露，美国财经媒体CNBC正重组其新闻编辑室，旨在整合电视与数字业务。此次重组将导致近十名员工离职，其中包括该网站执行主编杰夫·麦克拉肯。【原文：CNBC is restructuring its newsroom to unify its TV and digital operations in a move that would result in nearly a dozen layoffs including the departure of the website's managing editor, Jeff McCracken, four sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 据俄罗斯第一财经报道，俄当局考虑自四月初起封禁Telegram
item.description: 俄罗斯当局已确定封禁Telegram即时通讯应用的时间框架，据RBC通讯社周四报道，封禁行动可能于四月初实施。【原文：Russian authorities have decided on a time frame for blocking the Telegram messaging app and this may happen in early April, the RBC news outlet reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 美联储经济学家米兰：今年仍需四次降息25个基点，就业市场尚未"完全复苏"
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬·米兰表示，1月份强劲的就业增长"确实是件好事"，但美联储今年仍应将政策利率下调整整一个百分点，因为劳动力市场仍存在风险，而通胀已不再是问题。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said strong job growth in January was "a really good thing," but that the Fed should still cut a full percentage point from its policy rate this year because there were still risks to the labor market while inflation was no longer a problem.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称美国因乌克兰和平谈判放缓卢克石油资产出售进程
item.description: 据四位知情人士透露，美国已放缓俄罗斯石油巨头卢克石油公司国际资产的出售进程，意图将其作为乌克兰和平谈判中的筹码。【原文：The United States has slowed the sale of Russian oil giant Lukoil's international assets to use them as a bargaining chip in the Ukraine peace talks, according to four sources familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 黑客组织开始泄露荷兰电信Odido黑客事件中的客户数据
item.description: 荷兰电信公司Odido周四表示，在该国最大规模黑客攻击事件中，幕后犯罪集团已开始在暗网公布客户信息。【原文：The criminal group behind a hack at Dutch telecom Odido, one of the largest carried out in the Netherlands, has begun publishing customer information on the dark web, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国提议将瑞士银行从金融体系中剔除，因其涉嫌与伊朗、俄罗斯和委内瑞拉存在关联
item.description: 美国财政部周四提出一项拟议规则，若最终敲定，将切断瑞士银行MBaer Merchant Bank AG进入美国金融体系的渠道，理由是该行曾支持与伊朗和俄罗斯有关联的非法行为者。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department proposed a rule on Thursday that, if finalized, would sever MBaer Merchant Bank AG's access to the U.S. financial system on the grounds the Swiss bank had supported illicit actors linked to Iran and Russia.】

item.title: 特朗普政府着手废除拜登时期关于独立承包商的规定
item.description: 特朗普政府周四着手废除一项长期遭商业团体反对的法规，该法规使企业更难将雇员归类为独立承包商——雇员身份将增加企业成本。【原文：President Donald Trump's administration on Thursday moved to scrap a rule long opposed by business groups for making it harder to classify workers as independent contractors rather than employees, who can cost a company more.】

item.title: 消息人士称先正达计划于第二季度在香港进行最高达100亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: 知情人士向路透社透露，先正达集团计划在今年第二季度在香港进行最高达100亿美元的股票上市，并已聘请银行管理首次公开募股事宜。【原文：Syngenta Group plans to launch an up to $10 billion stock market listing in Hong Kong in the second quarter of this year and has hired banks to manage the initial public offering, two people with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 希腊法院裁定四名涉窃听丑闻者因非法获取私人数据罪名成立
item.description: 希腊一家法院周四裁定，监控公司Intellexa的创始人及其他三名人员在2020至2021年间犯有侵犯个人数据罪，并判处其监禁。这起窃听丑闻自2022年起持续冲击希腊政坛，此次判决为该案再添新转折。【原文：A Greek court on Thursday concluded that the founder of surveillance firm Intellexa and three other people were guilty of breaching personal data in 2020-2021 and sentenced them to prison terms, in the latest twist of wiretapping scandal that has rocked Greece since 2022.】

item.title: 胜利资本以每股57美元的价格对Janus Henderson提出竞争性收购要约
item.description: 胜利资本周四宣布，已提出以每股57.04美元的价格收购同行Janus Henderson。此前数月，这家资产管理公司刚与尼尔森·佩尔茨的Trian基金及风险投资公司General Catalyst达成74亿美元的交易。【原文：Victory Capital said on Thursday it has offered to buy peer Janus Henderson for $57.04 per share, months after the asset manager unveiled a $7.4 billion deal with Nelson Peltz's Trian and VC firm General Catalyst.】

item.title: eBay裁员6% 电商企业重组业务布局
item.description: eBay周四宣布将裁减约800个岗位，占其全职员工总数的6%左右。这家电商公司此举旨在精简运营，使人员配置与战略重点保持一致。【原文：Ebay said on Thursday it is cutting about 800 jobs, or roughly 6% of its full‑time workforce, as the e‑commerce company moves to streamline operations and align staffing with its strategic priorities.】

item.title: 美国结束对740万辆Stellantis汽车的调查，未要求召回
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周四结束了针对克莱斯勒母公司Stellantis旗下近740万辆美国汽车的长期调查。该调查涉及主动式头枕意外弹出问题，但监管机构未要求召回。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration on Thursday closed a long-running probe into nearly 7.4 million U.S. vehicles built by Chrysler-parent Stellantis over inadvertent deployments of active head rests without seeking a recall.】

item.title: 独家报道：博通预计到2027年将售出100万片3D堆叠芯片
item.description: 博通公司周三向路透社透露，这家人工智能芯片设计商预计到2027年将售出至少100万枚基于其堆叠设计技术的芯片。【原文：Artificial intelligence chip designer Broadcom said that it expects to sell at least 1 million chips by 2027 based on its stacked design tech, an executive told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普提升退休储蓄的计划是什么？
item.description: 周二，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普在国情咨文演讲中宣布了一项计划，该计划有望帮助数千万美国人储蓄养老金，为那些无法通过雇主赞助的退休计划进行储蓄的人提供了一种途径。【原文：President Donald Trump on Tuesday used his State of the Union address to announce a program that could help tens of millions of Americans save for retirement, giving those without access to an employer-sponsored retirement plan a vehicle to do so.】

item.title: OpenAI将伦敦打造为其在美国以外最大的研发中心
item.description: ChatGPT开发商OpenAI周四宣布，将把伦敦打造为其在美国以外最大的研发中心。该公司表示，英国的技术生态系统为投资和开发新型人工智能系统提供了理想环境。【原文：ChatGPT maker OpenAI said on Thursday that it would make London its largest research hub outside the United States, citing Britain's technology ecosystem as an ideal environment to invest in and develop new artificial intelligence systems.】

item.title: 美国每周初请失业金人数小幅上升，劳动力市场趋于稳定
item.description: 上周美国初请失业救济人数小幅上升，在劳动力市场保持稳定的背景下，2月份失业率似乎持平。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for jobless benefits increased marginally last week and the unemployment rate appeared to hold steady in February amid a stable labor market.】

item.title: 福特因软件问题召回430万辆美国汽车
item.description: 福特汽车周四宣布，将在美国召回430万辆皮卡和SUV，原因是软件故障可能导致刹车失灵和外部灯光故障。【原文：Ford Motor said Thursday it is recalling 4.3 million pickup trucks and SUVs in the United States because a software error may cause brakes not to function and exterior lights to fail.】

item.title: 诺瓦瓦克斯因疫苗交易强劲表现上调2026年调整后营收预期
item.description: 诺瓦瓦克斯公司周四上调了2026年调整后营收预期，因其预计疫苗供应及许可协议中的里程碑付款将抵消需求疲软带来的压力。【原文：Novavax raised its adjusted revenue forecast for 2026 on Thursday, as it expects milestone payments from vaccine supply and licensing deals to offset pressure from sagging demand.】

item.title: J.M. Smucker与Elliott达成协议，任命两名独立董事
item.description: J.M. Smucker公司周四宣布，在与投资者Elliott投资管理公司达成"建设性合作"后，已任命郑佑成和大卫·辛格加入其董事会。【原文：J.M. Smucker said on Thursday it had appointed Woo-Sung Chung and David Singer to its board, after reaching a "constructive engagement" with investor Elliott Investment Management.】
